lyrics.text:
‘Oku ou ‘ilo ‘a hoku Huhu’i;
Ne fua ‘eku hia he funga ‘Akau,
‘O ui ke u ‘alu ‘o ma’u ‘a e mo’ui:
Pea fakafeta’i na’a ku ‘alu ‘o ma’u.
Kae fēfē ‘a koe, ‘a koe ‘alā?

‘Oku Ne tu’u ‘i he ‘ao he ‘Otua,
Ko si’i Taula’eiki ‘o Maama kotoa;
‘O tuhu ki si’i ngaahi mata monuka,
‘O kole he Tamai ke ‘oua koā.
He hūfia koe, ‘a koe ‘alā.

‘Oi, ko hai te ne lau ‘eku nonga?
He mate he houhau ne tu’u faleloa,
He maʻa hoku langi, ‘o fu’u tafitonga;
O hā ai ‘a e ‘Eiki he taimi kotoa.
Kae fēfē ‘a koe, ‘a koe ‘alā?

Talu ‘a ‘eku ongo’i monū ni
He ta’emata’ofi he talanoa’ia,
‘O u fai pē ‘a e lea hoku Fakamo’ui,
“Mou omi ki heni, ‘a e kau mafasia.”
He ui ‘a koe, ‘a koe ‘alā.

Seuke, ‘a e neka ‘a si’oku loto,
He hanga ki muʻa ki he tu’a taimi na
Kuo mate ‘a Mate, ‘o ‘ikai kei ongo,
Kae hā mai ‘a e langi ko hoku tofi’a.
Kae fēfē ‘a koe, ‘a koe ‘alā?
